35 class PigeonImu : public CtreCanMap,

37 public:
39  struct FusionStatus {
40  double heading;
41  bool bIsValid;
42  bool bIsFusing;
43  std::string description;
47  int lastError;
48  };
50  enum CalibrationMode {
51  BootTareGyroAccel = 0,
52  Temperature = 1,
53  Magnetometer12Pt = 2,
54  Magnetometer360 = 3,
55  Accelerometer = 5,
56  };
58  enum PigeonState {
59  NoComm,
60  Initializing,
61  Ready,
62  UserCalibration,
63  };
94  struct GeneralStatus {
99  PigeonImu::PigeonState state;
104  PigeonImu::CalibrationMode currentMode;
111  int calibrationError;

120  std::string description;
124  double tempC;
130  int upTimeSec;
135  int noMotionBiasCount;
140  int tempCompensationCount;
144  int lastError;
145  };

156  ParamEnum_AccumZ = 170,

158  };

172  StatusFrameRate_BiasedStatus_6_Accel = 10,
173  };

254  SetValue = 0x00, AddOffset = 0x01, MatchCompass = 0x02, SetOffset = 0xFF,
255  };

267  ConnectCAN = 0x00000001,
268  ConnectTalonSRX = 0x00000002,
269

271  GetYPR = 0x10000000,

274  TempComp = 0x80000000,
275  };
